DOC.brief_summary: Main objective: investigate whether a functional polymorphism of CR1 (length, number of binding sites in C4b C3b, erythrocyte density, rate of soluble CR1 ...) so determined genetic or acquired, is a susceptibility factor for the disease Alzheimer's.
DOC.brief_title: Erythrocyte Complement Receptor 1 and Alzheimer Disease
DOC.criteria: caucasians people with a Alzheimer dementia defined on DSMIV criteria for patients and without Alzheimer disease for control subjects diseases modifying CR1 physiology
